RuntimeVersion.description: The version of the runtime to use.

Name.description: The name of the runtime to use.

CachingKeys.description: The caching keys for a resolver that has caching activated. Valid values are entries from the $context.arguments, $context.source, and $context.identity maps.

Ttl.description: The TTL in seconds for a resolver that has caching activated. Valid values are 1-36.00 seconds.

ConflictHandler.description: The Conflict Resolution strategy to perform in the event of a conflict.

ConflictDetection.description: The Conflict Detection strategy to use.

LambdaConflictHandlerConfig.description: The LambdaConflictHandlerConfig when configuring LAMBDA as the Conflict Handler.

LambdaConflictHandlerArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the Lambda function to use as the Conflict Handler.

ApiId.description: The AWS AppSync GraphQL API to which you want to attach this resolver.

CachingConfig.description: The caching configuration for the resolver.

Code.description: The resolver code that contains the request and response functions. When code is used, the runtime is required.

FieldName.description: The GraphQL field on a type that invokes the resolver.

MaxBatchSize.description: The maximum number of resolver request inputs that will be sent to a single AWS Lambda function in a BatchInvoke operation.

PipelineConfig.description: Functions linked with the pipeline resolver.

RequestMappingTemplate.description: Request mapping templates are optional when using a Lambda data source. For all other data sources, a request mapping template is required.

RequestMappingTemplateS3Location.description: The location of a request mapping template in an Amazon S3 bucket. Use this if you want to provision with a template file in Amazon S3 rather than embedding it in your CloudFormation template.

ResolverArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the resolver.

ResponseMappingTemplateS3Location.description: The location of a response mapping template in an Amazon S3 bucket. Use this if you want to provision with a template file in Amazon S3 rather than embedding it in your CloudFormation template.

Runtime.description: Describes a runtime used by an AWS AppSync pipeline resolver or AWS AppSync function. Specifies the name and version of the runtime to use. Note that if a runtime is specified, code must also be specified.

SyncConfig.description: The SyncConfig for a resolver attached to a versioned data source.

TypeName.description: The GraphQL type that invokes this resolver.
